## Public Member Functions

### clone() {#a0ff4fb3a0cf226a4463ad3857dae7013}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineFunctionInfo &#42; M68kMachineFunctionInfo::clone (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp; Allocator, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; DestMF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Src2DstMBB) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Make a functionally equivalent copy of this <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo">MachineFunctionInfo</a> in <code>MF</code>.

This requires remapping <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> references from the original parent to values in the new function. Targets may assume that virtual register and frame index values are preserved in the new function.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kmachinefunction-h/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kmachinefunction-h">M68kMachineFunction.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kmachinefunction-cpp/#l00022">22</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kmachinefunction-cpp">M68kMachineFunction.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### RestoreBasePointerOffset {#a470324884e0bf545e5a52f7f433b2669}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="signed char llvm::M68kMachineFunctionInfo::RestoreBasePointerOffset = 0">
Non-zero if the function has base pointer and makes call to llvm.eh.sjlj.setjmp.

When non-zero, the value is a displacement from the frame pointer to a slot where the base pointer is stashed.

### SRetReturnReg {#ad3654e9c0f7764060e103d0c6776a708}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::M68kMachineFunctionInfo::SRetReturnReg = 0">
Some subtargets require that sret lowering includes returning the value of the returned struct in a register.

This field holds the virtual register into which the sret argument is passed.
